heading: HB00037
0: AN ACT ALLOWING THE USE OF MOTORCYCLES AS PUBLIC UTILITY VEHICLES, AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 4136 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LAND TRANSPORTATION AND TRAFFIC CODE
short-title: Allowing The Use Of Motorcycles As Public Utility Vehicles, Amending For This Purpose Republic Act No. 4136
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-07-23
